extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites     FREN221 or (FREN212 and FREN220).
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from FREN351; FREN451.

basic.description: A study of representative works by African and the Caribbean writers. Travaux pratiques include essays and tests. Given jointly with FREN 451/3.0.
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Ecrits de la Francophonie
